definition: snail/Taiwan pr. [gua1]/see 蝸牛|蜗牛[wo1 niu2]

sentences.english: Humans are born with 30, 000 cochlear and vestibular hair cells per ear.
sentences.chinese: 人類每隻耳朵有3萬耳蝸毛細胞和前庭毛細胞。

sentences.english: The sound resonates through salty fluid that fills the hollow shell of the cochlea.
sentences.chinese: 此時，聲音就在充滿鹽性液體的耳蝸道迴響開來。

sentences.english: Such bone-conducted audio reaches the cochlea directly, completely bypassing the eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 這種通過骨傳導的聲音完全繞過耳鼓，直接傳入耳蝸。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of direct current on vibration of cochlear basilar membrane.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外加直流電流後對耳蝸基底膜振動的影響。

sentences.english: Cochlear preparation indicated the out hair cells were impaired.
sentences.chinese: 耳蝸鋪片顯示外毛細胞大部分受損。

sentences.english: Now I have a cochlear implant in each ear.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我每隻耳朵裏都植入了一個耳蝸。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the antagonism of breviscapine on cochlea toxicity of Cisplatin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燈盞花素對順鉑耳蝸毒性的拮抗作用。

sentences.english: Conclusions AMK can damage the cochlear hair cells, leading to decline in auditory function.
sentences.chinese: 結論AMK可損傷豚鼠耳蝸毛細胞，導致聽功能下降。

sentences.english: Cochlear hair cell change of guinea pigs at different time following gentamicin ototoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 慶大黴素中毒後不同時間豚鼠耳蝸毛細胞變化。

sentences.english: The response in inferior colliculus to low frequency electrical stimulation in cochlea showed phase locking.
sentences.chinese: 低頻電刺激耳蝸下丘的反應表現爲相位鎖定。

sentences.english: Signing of sales and distribution agreement with Cochlear Ltd. , Australia, for FM-Communication-Systems.
sentences.chinese: 與澳大利亞人工耳蝸公司科利耳關於FM的銷售協議。

sentences.english: Conclusion CT plays an indispensable role in the pre-operative evaluation of cochlear implantation.
sentences.chinese: 結論人工耳蝸植入術前評估，CT檢查必不可少。

sentences.english: Cochlear implantation in patients with ossified cochleas;
sentences.chinese: 探討人工耳蝸植入術的有關問題。

sentences.english: Cochlear malformation is the common reason for congenital sensorineural hearing loss.
sentences.chinese: 耳蝸畸形是先天性感音性聾的常見病因。

sentences.english: Inner ear is the key in the auditive system.
sentences.chinese: 在外周聽覺系統中，核心部分是內耳的耳蝸。

sentences.english: The size of the facial nerve and cochleovestibular nerve in IAC has individual difference.
sentences.chinese: IAC內面神經及耳蝸前庭神經粗細存在個體差異。

definition: to form a scar/to form a scab
variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
